alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 11:53PM CDT until May 13 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN KINGFISHER...NORTH CENTRAL CADDO...NORTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA...SOUTHERN BLAINE...SOUTHERN LOGAN AND NORTHERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 1152 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Guthrie to 7 miles southeast of Kingfisher to 4 miles northwest of Bridgeport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 1 inch hail in Kingfisher. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Edmond, Guthrie, Kingfisher, Piedmont, Hinton, Crescent, Geary, Okarche, Cashion, Calumet, Cedar Valley, Cimarron City, Bridgeport, Greenfield, Meridian, Concho, Seward, and Navina. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma
